column4: The standard product is designed to bring business value to small and medium size business.

column2: How do I change or reset my password?*
column3:
If you are logged in, click the logout button to get to the login page.

  1. Below the submit button, click the link called "Forgot my password."
  2. You should receive a new password to the email you used when you first got your account.
  3. Upon first login, you will be prompted for a new password.
column6:
Team - 20% of incoming calls are for password reset.
Please advise your cusotmers that now Cusotmer Portal has a link "Forgot your password?".
Thank you Salesforce for automating this process.

column3:
To restart the server you want to:
  1. Make sure you close out all open applications
  2. Power down the server using the shut down menu
  3. Unplug the power cable and wait 30 seconds.
  4. Plug it back in and turn it on.
  5. Put in your username and password at the prompt.

























You can also view the Microsoft server knowledge base article here: http://www.microsoft.com

• For your balance, please call our hotline 1-800-555-1212. Press 1 for Balance check.
  • We only handle Net 30 transactions
  • If you cannot afford to pay your bill, please call our hotline 1-800-555-1212
  • Send all of your statements to our headquarters address and make the check out to the finance department. The address is available on our company web site
